solACE 0.2.0
  • Reference

Load soilgrids

load_soilgrids.Rd

Loads a set of layers (defined by layer_names character-vector) from soilgrids into the soil project (this includes files in the defined path and the R environment, see: new_soil_project).

load_soilgrids(project_path, shape_file, layer_names)

Arguments

project_path

Path to the soil project.
shape_file

Shape file of the study area.
layer_names

Character vector for defining the soilgrids layers to load, e.g "BDRICM_M_250m".

Contents

  • Arguments
